verses.verse: <WH8451>"'This is the law of the trespass offering. <WH817> It is most <WH6944> holy. <WH6944>

In the place <WH4725> where they kill <WH7819> the burnt offering, <WH5930> he shall kill <WH7819> the trespass offering; <WH817> and its blood <WH1818> he shall sprinkle <WH2236> around <WH5439> on the altar. <WH4196>
He shall offer <WH7126> all of its fat: <WH2459> the fat tail, <WH451> and the fat <WH2459> that covers <WH3680> the innards, <WH7130>

and the two <WH8147> kidneys, <WH3629> and the fat <WH2459> that is on them, <WH3689> which is by the loins, and the cover <WH3508> on the liver, <WH3516> with the kidneys, <WH3629> shall he take away; <WH5493>
and the priest <WH3548> shall burn <WH6999> them on the altar <WH4196> for an offering made by fire <WH801> to Yahweh: <WH3068> it is a trespass offering. <WH817>
Every male <WH2145> among the priests <WH3548> may eat <WH398> of it. <WH398> It shall be eaten in a holy <WH6918> place. <WH4725> It is most <WH6944> holy. <WH6918>
<WH2403>"'As is the sin offering, so is the trespass offering; <WH817> there is one <WH259> law <WH8451> for them. <WH3548> The priest who makes atonement with them shall have it. <WH3722>

The priest <WH3548> who offers <WH7126> any man <WH376>'s burnt offering, <WH5930> even the priest <WH3548> shall have for himself the skin <WH5785> of the burnt offering <WH5930> which he has offered. <WH7126>

Every meal offering <WH4503> that is baked <WH644> in the oven, <WH8574> and all that is dressed <WH6213> in the pan, <WH4227> and on the griddle, <WH4227> shall be the priest <WH3548>'s who offers it. <WH7126>
Every meal offering, <WH4503> mixed <WH1101> with oil <WH8081> or dry, <WH2720> belongs to all the sons <WH1121> of Aaron, <WH175> one <WH376> as well as another. <WH251>
<WH8451>"'This is the law of the sacrifice <WH2077> of peace offerings, <WH8002> which one shall offer <WH7126> to Yahweh. <WH3068>

If he offers <WH7126> it for a thanksgiving, <WH8426> then he shall offer <WH7126> with the sacrifice <WH2077> of thanksgiving <WH8426> unleavened <WH4682> cakes <WH2471> mixed <WH1101> with oil, <WH8081> and unleavened <WH4682> wafers <WH7550> anointed <WH4886> with oil, <WH8081> and cakes <WH2471> mixed <WH1101> with oil. <WH8081>
With cakes <WH2471> of leavened <WH2557> bread <WH3899> he shall offer <WH7126> his offering <WH7133> with the sacrifice <WH2077> of his peace offerings <WH8002> for thanksgiving. <WH8426>

Of it he shall offer <WH7126> one <WH259> out of each <WH259> offering <WH7133> for a heave offering <WH7133> to Yahweh. <WH3068> It shall be the priest <WH3548>'s who sprinkles the blood <WH1818> of the peace offerings. <WH8002>

The flesh <WH1320> of the sacrifice <WH2077> of his peace offerings <WH8002> for thanksgiving <WH8426> shall be eaten <WH398> on the day <WH3117> of his offering. <WH7133> He shall not leave <WH3240> any of it until the morning. <WH1242>

<WH2077>"'But if the sacrifice of his offering <WH7133> is a vow, <WH5088> or a freewill offering, <WH5071> it shall be eaten <WH398> on the day <WH3117> that he offers <WH7126> his sacrifice; <WH2077> and on the next day <WH4283> what remains <WH3498> of it shall be eaten: <WH398>
but what remains <WH3498> of the flesh <WH1320> of the sacrifice <WH2077> on the third <WH7992> day <WH3117> shall be burned <WH8313> with fire. <WH784>

If any of the flesh <WH1320> of the sacrifice <WH2077> of his peace offerings <WH8002> is eaten <WH398> on <WH398> the third <WH7992> day, <WH3117> it will not be accepted, <WH7521> neither shall it be imputed <WH2803> to him who offers <WH7126> it. <WH6292> It will be an abomination, and the soul <WH5315> who eats <WH398> any of it will bear <WH5375> his iniquity. <WH5771>

<WH1320>"'The flesh that touches <WH5060> any unclean <WH2931> thing shall not be eaten. <WH398> It shall be burned <WH8313> with fire. <WH784> As for the flesh, <WH1320> everyone who is clean <WH2889> may eat it; <WH398>

but the soul <WH5315> who eats <WH398> of the flesh <WH1320> of the sacrifice <WH2077> of peace offerings, <WH8002> that belongs to Yahweh, <WH3068> having his uncleanness <WH2932> on him, <WH5315> that soul shall be cut off <WH3772> from his people. <WH5971>

When anyone <WH5315> touches <WH5060> any unclean <WH2932> thing, <WH2932> the uncleanness of man, <WH120> or an unclean <WH2932> animal, <WH929> or any unclean <WH2931> abomination, <WH8263> and eats <WH398> some of the flesh <WH1320> of the sacrifice <WH2077> of peace offerings, <WH8002> which belong to Yahweh, <WH3068> that soul <WH5315> shall be cut off <WH3772> from his people. <WH5971>'"
Yahweh <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>
"Speak <WH1696> to the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> saying, <WH559> <WH398> 'You shall eat no fat, <WH2459> of bull, <WH7794> or sheep, <WH3775> or goat. <WH5795>

The fat <WH2459> of that which dies of itself, <WH5038> and the fat <WH2459> of that which is torn of animals, <WH2966> may be used <WH6213> for any other service, <WH4399> but you shall in no way <WH398> eat of it. <WH398>

For whoever eats <WH398> the fat <WH2459> of the animal, <WH929> of which men offer <WH7126> an offering made by fire <WH801> to Yahweh, <WH3068> even the soul <WH5315> who eats <WH398> it shall be cut off <WH3772> from his people. <WH5971>
You shall not eat <WH398> any blood, <WH1818> whether it is of bird <WH5775> or of animal, <WH929> in any of your dwellings. <WH4186>
Whoever <WH5315> it is who eats <WH398> any <WH3605> blood, <WH1818> that soul <WH5315> shall be cut off <WH3772> from his people. <WH5971>'"
Yahweh <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>

"Speak <WH1696> to the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> saying, <WH559> <WH7126> 'He who offers the sacrifice <WH2077> of his peace offerings <WH8002> to Yahweh <WH3068> shall bring <WH935> his offering <WH7133> to Yahweh <WH3068> out of the sacrifice <WH2077> of his peace offerings. <WH8002>

With his own hands <WH3027> he shall bring <WH935> the offerings <WH801> of Yahweh <WH3068> made by fire. <WH801> He shall bring <WH935> the fat <WH2459> with the breast, <WH2373> that the breast <WH2373> may be waved <WH5130> for a wave offering <WH8573> before <WH6440> Yahweh. <WH3068>
The priest <WH3548> shall burn <WH6999> the fat <WH2459> on the altar, <WH4196> but the breast <WH2373> shall be Aaron <WH175>'s and his sons <WH1121>'.
The right <WH3225> thigh <WH7785> you shall give <WH5414> to the priest <WH3548> for a heave offering <WH8641> out of the sacrifices <WH2077> of your peace offerings. <WH8002>

He among the sons <WH1121> of Aaron <WH175> who offers <WH7126> the blood <WH1818> of the peace offerings, <WH8002> and the fat, <WH2459> shall have the right <WH3225> thigh <WH7785> for a portion. <WH4490>

For the waved <WH8573> breast <WH2373> and the heaved <WH8641> thigh <WH7785> I have taken <WH3947> from the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> out of the sacrifices <WH2077> of their peace offerings, <WH8002> and have given <WH5414> them to Aaron <WH175> the priest <WH3548> and to his sons <WH1121> as their portion <WH2706> forever <WH5769> from the children <WH1121> of Israel. <WH3478>'"

This is the anointing <WH4888> portion of Aaron, <WH175> and the anointing <WH4888> portion of his sons, <WH1121> out of the offerings <WH801> of Yahweh <WH3068> made by fire, <WH801> in the day <WH3117> when he presented <WH7126> them to minister to Yahweh <WH3068> in the priest <WH3547>'s office;

which Yahweh <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> to be given <WH5414> them of the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> in the day <WH3117> that he anointed <WH4886> them. <WH2708> It is their portion forever <WH5769> throughout their generations. <WH1755>

This is the law <WH8451> of the burnt offering, <WH5930> of the meal offering, <WH4503> and of the sin offering, <WH2403> and of the trespass offering, <WH817> and of the consecration, <WH4394> and of the sacrifice <WH2077> of peace offerings; <WH8002>

which Yahweh <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> Moses <WH4872> in Mount <WH2022> Sinai, <WH5514> in the day <WH3117> that he commanded <WH6680> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> to offer <WH7126> their offerings <WH7133> to Yahweh, <WH3068> in the wilderness <WH4057> of Sinai. <WH5514>
